docs.summary: Returns a totals calculation for specified line items.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line (usually street name and number).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains apt, suite, floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: Two-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/) format.

members.name: countryFullname
members.doc: Country's full name.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number, name, and apartment number in separate fields.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: subdivisionFullname
members.doc: Subdivision full-name.

members.name: discountType
members.doc:
Discount type.
One of:
GLOBAL,
SHIPPING,
SPECIFIC_ITEMS

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items the discount applies to.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: Coupon details.

members.name: discountRule
members.doc: Discount rule

members.name: merchantDiscount
members.doc: Merchant discount.

members.name: error
members.doc: invalid request (i.e. address), timeout, internal error, license error, and others will be encoded here

members.name: fallbackReason
members.doc:
reason for fallback
One of:
AUTO_TAX_DEACTIVATED,
AUTO_TAX_FAILED

members.name: billingAddress
members.doc: Billing address. Used for calculating tax if product is not shippable.

members.name: buyerEmail
members.doc: Buyer email. Used to enforce coupon [single-use per customer](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-limiting-coupon-usage). If not passed, single coupon usage per customer will not be enforced.

members.name: calculationId
members.doc:
Calculation ID. An identifier of the entity that you are calculating totals for, for example, cart ID or checkout ID.
This value will be used in order to optimise calculations by caching.
If not passed, calculation might be slower in some cases.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon code.

members.name: couponId
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: giftCardCode
members.doc: Gift card code.

members.name: giftCardId
members.doc: Gift card ID.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items for calculation.

members.name: memberId
members.doc:
Member id to use for this calculation
When not provided, given that the caller is a member, its member id will be used
Providing this require elevated permissions - ECOM.ADMIN_CALCULATE_TOTALS

members.name: merchantDiscounts
members.doc: Merchant discounts.

members.name: selectedMemberships
members.doc:
The selected memberships and which line items they apply to
When not provided, default selection will be returned
You can also set it to empty selection

members.name: selectedShippingOption
members.doc: Details about selected shipping option.

members.name: shippingAddress
members.doc: Shipping address for tax and shipping calculation (if applicable).

members.name: billingAddress
members.doc: Billing address. Used for calculating tax if product is not shippable.

members.name: buyerEmail
members.doc: Buyer email. Used to enforce coupon [single-use per customer](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-stores-limiting-coupon-usage). If not passed, single coupon usage per customer will not be enforced.

members.name: calculationId
members.doc:
Calculation ID. An identifier of the entity that you are calculating totals for, for example, cart ID or checkout ID.
This value will be used in order to optimise calculations by caching.
If not passed, calculation might be slower in some cases.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items for calculation.

members.name: memberId
members.doc:
Member id to use for this calculation
When not provided, given that the caller is a member, its member id will be used
Providing this require elevated permissions - ECOM.ADMIN_CALCULATE_TOTALS

members.name: merchantDiscounts
members.doc: Merchant discounts.

members.name: selectedMemberships
members.doc:
The selected memberships and which line items they apply to
When not provided, default selection will be returned
You can also set it to empty selection

members.name: selectedShippingOption
members.doc: Details about selected shipping option.

members.name: shippingAddress
members.doc: Shipping address for tax and shipping calculation (if applicable).

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon code.

members.name: couponId
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: giftCardCode
members.doc: Gift card code.

members.name: giftCardId
members.doc: Gift card ID.

members.name: appliedDiscounts
members.doc: Applied discounts.

members.name: calculatedLineItems
members.doc: Calculate line items.

members.name: calculationErrors
members.doc: Calculation errors.

members.name: conversionCurrency
members.doc: Converted prices are presented in this currency.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency.

members.name: giftCard
members.doc: Details of applied gift card.

members.name: membershipOptions
members.doc: Information about valid and invalid memberships, and which ones are selected for usage

members.name: payLater
members.doc: Remaining amount so that the order will be fully payed

members.name: payNow
members.doc: Minimal amount to pay in order to place the order

members.name: priceSummary
members.doc: Price summary.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: Shipping information.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in price.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Tax summary.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc:
Weight unit.
One of:
KG,
LB,
UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT

members.name: lineItemId
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item
FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE - The entire payment for this item will happen as part of the checkout
FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE - The entire payment for this item will happen after the checkout
MEMBERSHIP - This item cannot be paid via monetary payment options, only via non monetary option such membership. When this option is used, price must be set to 0
DEPOSIT_ONLINE -  Partial payment of the given item will happen as part of the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by deposit_amount field.
One of:
DEPOSIT_ONLINE,
FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE,
FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE,
MEMBERSHIP

members.name: pricesBreakdown
members.doc: Price breakdown for this line item.

members.name: couponCalculationError
members.doc: Coupon calculation error.

members.name: discountsCalculationError
members.doc: Discount Rule calculation error.

members.name: giftCardCalculationError
members.doc: Gift card calculation error.

members.name: membershipError
members.doc:
Membership payment methods calculation errors
For example, will indicate that a line item that must be paid with membership payment doesn't have one or selected memberships are invalid

members.name: orderValidationErrors
members.doc: Order validation errors.

members.name: taxCalculationError
members.doc: Tax calculation error.

members.name: carrierErrors
members.doc: Carrier errors.

members.name: generalShippingCalculationError
members.doc: General shipping calculation error.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: Carrier ID.

members.name: error
members.doc: Error details.

members.name: errors
members.doc: Carrier errors.

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: Carrier ID.

members.name: shippingOptions
members.doc: Shipping options offered by this carrier for this request.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app. For example, the Wix Stores `appId`, or the 3rd-party `appId`.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `eventId` for Wix Events.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional info in key:value form. For example, `{"options":{"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}` or `{"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

description: Used for grouping line items and is sent on add to cart

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Coupon value.

members.name: code
members.doc: Coupon code.

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon name.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time, in free text. For example, "3-5 business days".

members.name: instructions
members.doc: Instructions for caller, e.g for pickup: "Please deliver during opening hours, and please don't park in disabled parking spot".

members.name: pickupDetails
members.doc: Pickup details.

members.name: tracing
members.doc: deprecated in API's - to enable migration from rendering arbitrary tracing to rest response

members.name: _id
members.doc: Discount rule ID

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: name
members.doc: Discount rule name

members.name: original
members.doc: Original discount rule name (in site's default language).

members.name: translated
members.doc: Translated discount rule name according to buyer language. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: ruleName
members.doc: applicable when violated_rule=OTHER

members.name: violatedRule
members.doc:
One of:
DECIMAL_GT,
DECIMAL_GTE,
DECIMAL_LT,
DECIMAL_LTE,
DECIMAL_MAX_SCALE,
FORMAT,
INVALID_ENUM_VALUE,
MAX,
MAX_LENGTH,
MAX_SIZE,
MIN,
MIN_LENGTH,
MIN_SIZE,
OTHER,
REQUIRED_FIELD,
VALIDATION

members.name: _id
members.doc: Gift Card ID.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Gift card value.

members.name: appId
members.doc: App ID of the gift card provider.

members.name: obfuscatedCode
members.doc: Gift card obfuscated code.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Item ID (when the coupon scope is limited to just one item).

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon scope's group (e.g., product or collection in Wix Stores). See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: membership
members.doc: The membership

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason why this membership is invalid and cannot be used

members.name: rateBreakdown
members.doc: If breakdown exists, the sum of rates in the breakdown must equal `tax_rate`.

members.name: taxRate
members.doc: Tax rate %, as a decimal point between 0 and 1.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, based on `taxable_amount` and `tax_rate`.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc:
Optional references to the line item's origin catalog.
See [Catalog SPI](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rest/ecommerce/catalog-spi/introduction) for more details.
This field is empty in the case of a custom line item.
currently we only use the catalog app id to set tax=0 for specific apps.

members.name: depositAmount
members.doc:
Optional - partial amount of item's price to be paid now for checkout cases with DEPOSIT_ONLINE payment option
If omitted - item's price will not be split and is expected to be paid in single installment

members.name: paymentOption
members.doc:
Type of selected payment option for current item. Defaults to `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE`.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens as part of the checkout.
+ `FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE` - The entire payment for this item happens after the checkout. For example, when using cash, cheque, or other offline payment methods.
+ `MEMBERSHIP` - Payment for this item is done by charging a membership. When this option is used, `lineItem.price.amount` will be 0.
+ `DEPOSIT_ONLINE` -  Partial payment for the given item to be paid upfront during the checkout. Amount to be paid is defined by deposit_amount field.
One of:
DEPOSIT_ONLINE,
FULL_PAYMENT_OFFLINE,
FULL_PAYMENT_ONLINE,
MEMBERSHIP

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties (if applicable).

members.name: price
members.doc: Price.

members.name: productName
members.doc: Product/booking/event name.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Quantity.

members.name: rootCatalogItemId
members.doc:
In cases where `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is NOT the actual catalog item ID, this field will return the true item's ID.
+ For example, for Wix Bookings, `catalogReference.catalogItemId` is the booking ID. Therefore this value is set to the service ID.
+ In most cases, this field has the same value as `catalogReference.catalogItemId`.
+ Used in membership validation.

members.name: serviceProperties
members.doc: Service properties. When relevant, this contains information such as date and number of participants.

members.name: subscriptionSettings
members.doc: Subscription settings.

members.name: price
members.doc: Catalog price after catalog discount.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Total discount for all line items.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts and after tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Total price after discounts, before tax.

members.name: _id
members.doc: The id of this membership

members.name: additionalData
members.doc: Additional data about this membership

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option

members.name: credits
members.doc: Optional - For a membership that has limited credits, information about credit usage

members.name: expirationDate
members.doc: Optional - The membership expiry date

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: Line items ids which are "paid" by this membership

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of this membership

members.name: original
members.doc: The name of this membership

members.name: translated
members.doc: Optional - Translated name of this membership. Defaults to `original` when not provided.

members.name: eligibleMemberships
members.doc: List of payment options that can be used

members.name: invalidMemberships
members.doc: List of payment options that are owned by the member, but cannot be used due to reason provided

members.name: selectedMemberships
members.doc: The selected payment options and which line items they apply to

members.name: remaining
members.doc: How much credit remained for this membership

members.name: total
members.doc: How much credit this membership has in total

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount value.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Discount amount.

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of line items the discount applies to.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Amount.

members.name: convertedAmount
members.doc: Converted amount.

members.name: formattedAmount
members.doc: Amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: formattedConvertedAmount
members.doc: Converted amount formatted with currency symbol.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of added cost.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Type of additional cost.
One of:
HANDLING_FEE,
INSURANCE

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this line item is shippable.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock-keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: weight
members.doc: Line item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `order.weightUnit`.

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address.

members.name: businessLocation
members.doc: Whether the pickup address is that of a business - this may effect tax calculation.

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc:
Pickup method
One of:
PICKUP_POINT,
STORE_PICKUP,
UNKNOWN_METHOD

members.name: discount
members.doc: Total calculated discount value.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Total shipping price, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all line items, before discounts and before tax.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Total tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total price after discounts, gift cards, and tax.

members.name: group
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., event or ticket in Wix Events)

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events)

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: This carrier's unique ID

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique identifier of selected option. For example, "usps_std_overnight".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping costs.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other charges

members.name: requestedShippingOption
members.doc: Were we able to find the requested shipping option, or otherwise we fallback to the default one (the first)

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: cost
members.doc: Price of added charge.

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the charge, such as 'Full Coverage Insurance of up to 80% of value of shipment'.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Type of additional cost.
One of:
HANDLING_FEE,
INSURANCE

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price before discount and before tax.

members.name: taxDetails
members.doc: Tax details.

members.name: totalDiscount
members.doc: Shipping discount before tax.

members.name: totalPriceAfterTax
members.doc: Total shipping price, after discount and after tax.

members.name: totalPriceBeforeTax
members.doc: Totals shipping price after discount and before tax.

members.name: _id
members.doc: The membership id

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the application providing this payment option

members.name: lineItemIds
members.doc: IDs of the line items this membership applies to.

members.name: memberships
members.doc: Selected memberships

members.name: carrierId
members.doc: Carrier ID.

members.name: code
members.doc: Selected shipping option code. For example, "usps_std_overnight".

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Optional - The number of people participating in this service. e.g the number of people attending the class or the number of people for a hotel room

members.name: scheduledDate
members.doc: Optional - The date and time for which the service is supposed to be provided. e.g the time of the class

members.name: carrierServiceOptions
members.doc: All shipping options.

members.name: region
members.doc: Shipping region.

members.name: selectedCarrierServiceOption
members.doc: Selected shipping option.

members.name: code
members.doc:
Unique code of provided shipping option like "usps_std_overnight".
For legacy calculators this would be the UUID of the option.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Sipping price information.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Delivery logistics.

members.name: title
members.doc:
Title of the option, such as USPS Standard Overnight Delivery (in the requested locale).
For example, "Standard" or "First-Class Package International".

members.name: otherCharges
members.doc: Other costs such as insurance, handling & packaging for fragile items, etc.

members.name: price
members.doc: Shipping price.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Shipping region ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Shipping region name.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: frequency
members.doc:
Frequency of recurring payment. Every day/week/month/year.
One of:
DAY,
MONTH,
UNDEFINED,
WEEK,
YEAR

members.name: rateType
members.doc:
rate calculation type
One of:
AUTO_RATE,
FALLBACK_RATE,
MANUAL_RATE,
NO_TAX_COLLECTED

members.name: autoTaxFallbackDetails
members.doc: details of the fallback rate calculation

members.name: manualRateReason
members.doc:
reason for the manual calculation being used
One of:
GLOBAL_SETTING_TO_MANUAL,
REGION_SETTING_TO_MANUAL

members.name: name
members.doc: Type of tax against which the calculation was performed.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Rate at which this tax detail was calculated.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Amount of tax for this tax detail.

members.name: calculationDetails
members.doc: Tax calculator that was active when the order was created.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Amount for which tax is calculated, added from line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc: Calculated tax, added from line items.
